original_title: Cat in the Hat: Miles & Miles of Reptiles
overview: Oh the slithery and scaly friends we shall meet, when the Cat takes us all for a delightful new treat! Ziggy Iguana can turn light when it's hot And Gecko has tricks you might see him or not! A quick adventure to keep up the fun, With the Cat Nick and Sally, Thing Two and Thing One!
title: Cat in the Hat: Miles & Miles of Reptiles
